ygData.subject: Re: CAMPING
ygData.msgSnippet: Is it just me or do we need more areas in the game ... a couple of new zones wouldn t hurt. It MIGHT help with camping but then again ... it might not. I was
ygData.messageBody:
Is it just me or do we need more areas in the game ... a couple of new zones
wouldn't hurt. It MIGHT help with camping but then again ... it might not. I was
in Befallen the other night and I swear I couldn't see a single skelton for the
first floor and a half. (If you've never been there it's like wall to wall
skeletons.)

Anyway, I hear you brother .... hopefully someone at Verant will notice and
attempt to fix the situation in some way. Something like a high level mob spawn
on top of a camping group would suit me just fine. :)

-Faderic


"Mifsud, Michael" wrote:

> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Hmmm I am really starting to hate campers.
>
> I use to take camping with a grain of salt and just move on. This is now
> becoming IMPOSSIBLE for me at my level to do. Let me recite a little story.
>
> I login on Saturday starting out in lake rathe, camped. Not to fussed since
> I can not pull the aviaks anyway, only CASTERS can. Whats up with that?
>
> I moved on to the Egret Aviaks, CAMPED. hmmm no problem lets try HH, both
> ends camped. sigh, oh well im near Neriak I can head home to stock up and
> try out lesser faydark and Mistmoore. On the boat I get, I arrive in
> Mistmoore for the first time, thought the place was pretty cool. Learned
> the easier areas pretty quick and start pulling for my group.
>
> Wow this is going pretty well. Hmmm zone went from 2 groups to 5 groups.
> One group SIITING on the gargoyle spawn, another group hogging THE whole
> graveyard, and the third, this is the best, the third camping the CORRIDOR
> between the easy side of Mistmoore to the hard side of Mistmoore. I mean
> C'MON. Thats just RUDE. Everytime we tried to pull some tuffer mobs
> through the corridor their mages pets went berserk and they effectively took
> all the kills.
>
> SIGH
>
> I remember when lake rathe was empty. I remember when HH was empty. Is it
> just because most people on the server are my level ?
>
> People just DONT understand that a spawn can only support SO many groups.
> Oh, a word of warning, NEVER take a caster to the Aviaks In Lake Rathe, they
> wont leave. I know a few of my friends who I didn't see until they made
> level 25. They just would not leave that easy xp area. I hate it.
>
> ARGH!
>
> ahhh I feel much better now, thanks for listening.
>
> I will be starting a new character on MM just to see if its a little better
> WAY behind the pack. Lets hope it is.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> What do lizards and rock music have in common?
> http://www.onelist.com
> They both have communities at ONElist. Find yours today!
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
